channel.title: Tim Scott on Contact United States Senators and Governors

item.title: Tim Scott biograph
item.description: Senator Tim Scott biograph Senator Timothy Eugene Scott is an American businessman and politician. He has been serving as a junior US Senator from South Carolina under the Republicans since 2013. He was a member of the US House of Representatives from 2011 to 2013. He also served as a member of the South Carolina House of Assembly from 1998 to 2008. Senator Tim Scott was born in North Charleston, South Carolina, on September 19, 1965.
